Posts.Title: Has anyone heard from Stephanie? badboob67 jansdaughter

Posts.Content: Aug 29, 2008 01:10AM - edited Aug 29, 2008 01:13AM by sparkie Stephanie, I've not posted much, but I've been following all your stories.  My daughter (who won't come to this website) is battling mets to lungs and brain after first being diagnosed w/breast cancer in May 2001).  She has been treated several times with cyberknife for the brain mets.  In June (I think) they radiated about 7-8 small brain lesions.  The docs have been willing to do the cyberknife even with that many lesions. So far so good. And whether you go with gamma or WBR, you're right; God IS able!
